1 #include<ros/ros.h>
2 #include<multi_robot_controller/input/input_base.hpp>
3 #include<multi_robot_controller/input/input_pose_odom.hpp>
4 #include<multi_robot_controller/input/input_types.hpp>
5 #include<multi_robot_controller/rigid_motion/constrained_rigid_motion_tf.h>
6 #include<geometry_msgs/PoseStamped.h>
7 int main(int argc, char** argv)
8 {
9  ros::init(argc,argv,"rigid_transformer");
10  ros::NodeHandle nh;
11  ros::NodeHandle priv("~");
12  ros::Publisher pub=nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("rigid_transformed",10);
13  int input_type;
14  priv.getParam("input_type",input_type);
15  InputBase* input;
16  switch(InputTypes(input_type))
17  {
18  case InputTypes::POSE_ODOM:
19  input = new InputPoseOdom(nh,priv);
20  break;
21  default:
22  break;
23  }
24  ros::Rate rate(10);
25  while (ros::ok())
26  {
27  ConstrainedRigidMotionTf rigid;
28  rigid.updateInputState(input->getPose(),input->getLinVel(),input->getAngVel(),input->getTime().toSec());
29 
30  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose_transformed;
31  tf::poseTFToMsg(tf::Pose(tf::createQuaternionFromYaw(rigid.getState()(2)),tf::Vector3(rigid.getState()(0),rigid.getState()(1),0.0)),pose_transformed.pose);
32  pub.publish(pose_transformed);
33  ros::spinOnce();
34  rate.sleep();
35  }
36 
37 
38 }
